name: Switcher (itch) (nortti)
description:
Left arrow key  - left

Right arrow key - right

Space - jump

R - rebind controls

.iso files are full Sortix builds with the game set to launch automatically, and can be run in qemu, VirtualBox, or even real hardware. Sortix is free software and the source code can be examined at /src inside the live environment.

.tix.tar.xz files are for if you have an existing Sortix installation.

Switcher is free software.
